author: dantraMSFT
body:
The latest PSRP/Linux release contains fixes that impact PowerShell remoting, including:

* a stale pointer fix: https://github.com/Microsoft/omi/issues/502
* a deadlock fix: (https://github.com/PowerShell/psl-omi-provider/pull/115)
title: Update PowerShell to reference PSRP/Linux v1.4.2-2
